casebody.data:
Frank SEGRAVE, Appellee, v. HABIRSHAW CABLE & WIRE CORPORATION, Appellant. National Surety Corporation, Appellant. No. 162. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 4, 1937. Kirlin, Campbell, Hiclcox, Keating & McGrann and Gleason, McLanahan, Merritt & Ingraham, all of New York City (Edward Sere Murphy and A. V. Cherbonnier, both of New York City, of counsel), -for appellants. Lynch, Hagen & Atkins, of New York City (Henry C. Eideribach, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
